name: Pedro the Lost Levels
description:
Pedro and his brother Miguel embark on a new treasure hunting quest in the Jungol

region, but they'll have to outsmart the Air Raiders if they'll want to reach the treasure first!

controls:

A - left

D - right

S - down

W - up/interact with doors, people, etc

L - jump

K - shoot

Enter - select on title screen/stop reading dialogue

Want more run & gun action like this? Buy the game that takes place before it! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2013800/Pedro_Land_DX/
